com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator

Class PropagatorFunctionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl
      • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.AbstractAdapter
        • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.PropagatorAbstractAdapter
          • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.PropagatorFunctionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter.Internal

    public abstract class PropagatorFunctionAdapter
extends PropagatorAbstractAdapter

    Manage the refresh of derived data elements by listening to changes, remembering when out of date, and declaring data elements this data element depends on.

    A PropagatorFunctionAdapter:

    • offers two call-backs methods that may be overridden by the concrete PropagatorFunctionAdapter in order to implement the refresh logic for the derived elements this adapter is responsible for; the whole purpose of the present framework is to call one of these methods exactly when needed:
      • calculate(), that will be called when no touching Notifier has been tracked
      • calculate(Object), that will be called for every touching Notifier that has been tracked, if any
    • maintains its touched state
      • whether this propagator is up to date or not (up to date = untouched, needs refresh = touched): accessor isTouched()
      • a collection of touched children of this propagator: field touchedFunctionAdapters
      • a collection of Notifier's responsible for the touching: field touchers
    • offers a method, insuring that this Propagator become up to date: method refresh(); this entails
      • refreshing all antecedents ancestors: the parent, the parent's parent, ..., recursively
      • refreshing all antecedents siblings, antecedent's antecedents sibling, ... recursively
      • refreshing all children
      • refreshing this Propagator: method calculate()
    • listens to change notifications
      • of this PropagatorFunctionAdapter's notifier by overriding see PropagatorAbstractAdapter.notifyChanged(Notification)
      • of other Notifiers, by delegating to some extension of PropagatorDependencyAdapter
    • declares
      • a Parent PropagatorFunctionAdapter: accessor getParent()
      • a collection of siblings PropagatorFunctionAdapter it depends on: accessor getAntecedents()
      satisfying
      • first the antecedents siblings will be refreshed
      • second the children will be refreshed
      • finally this propagator will be refreshed

    The PropagatorFunctionAdapter life cycle is as follows

    • It is created by ObjectWithPropagatorFunctionAdapter.addPropagatorFunctionAdapter(), called by the method PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager.onAdapterAdded(org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier)
      • either when the object is contained
      • or when the PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager is added to the scope of the propagation
    • The propagator is removed by the method PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager.onAdapterRemoved(org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier)
      • either when the object is no longer contained
      • or when the PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager is removed from the scope of the propagation
    • The propagator removal will be delayed when touched, to the untouch()
    • When a PropagatorFunctionAdapter is added, following methods are called to initialize it
      • method PropagatorAbstractAdapter.addPropagatorFunctionAdapters()
      • method refreshParent()
    Author:
    michel

      • refresh

        public boolean refresh()
        Refresh the PropagatorFunctionAdapter, so as is becomes untouched. Make no assumption on the antecedents states or parent states Propagate minimally so that this PropagatorFunctionAdapter becomes up to date
        Returns:
        false when an error occurred, propagator not refreshed

      • depthFirstSearch

        public static boolean depthFirstSearch(PropagatorFunctionAdapter functionAdapter)
        Start a depth first traversal of the antecedents and refresh every node visited, with as initial node functionAdapter
        Returns:
        false when an error occurred, propagator not refreshed
